category.title: Grade 4
category.description: Very heavy damage (heavy structural damage such as fallen walls, fallen roof or floors)

category.title: Grade 3
category.description: Substantial to heavy damage (moderate structural damage such as large and extensive cracks in walls, missing parts of roof, broken chimney, unstable walls, etc.)

category.title: Grade 2
category.description: Moderate damage (slight structural damage like cracks in many of the walls, large pieces of plaster falling off, chimney collapsing, etc.)

category.title: Grade 1
category.description: Negiligible to slight damage (no structural damage) - loose or fallen stones, hairline cracks, etc.

category.title: Grade 5
category.description: Destruction (very heavy structural damage, such as total or near collapse of the building)

category.title: Unknown
category.description: You do not know or are unsure of the category

category.title: Other
category.description: The category is not already mentioned
